column1: * 1933 - J.R.R. Tolkiens poem "Errantry" is published in The Oxford Magazine.

column2: J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (9/10 November 1957).

column1: * 1967 - Smith of Wootton Major is first published in the UK.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is released in Germany and Russia.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
